subject: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Attn: Beneficiary
How are you doing?
Are you Still willing to receive your outstanding funds? I will help you to receive your funds without long  protocols.
Write back let me direct you on the way forward

subject: Re:  Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello there! 

I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I hope you're doing great too. 

Regarding the funds, could you please provide me with more information? What are these funds for and how did I become eligible to receive them? I would appreciate your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Dear Beloved Elizabeth
body:
Dear Beloved  Elizabeth
Thanks for your response to my email and I am willing to do what I stated.
Well let me tell you, I am a man of honor, God fearing and respect for
human dignity. I have never disappointed anybody before both in my chosen
career as a Government Official and in my community as one of the main
leaders. I am really sure of what I will do to get this payment approved in
our favor without any problem.

What I need is your understanding and trust nothing more I will perfect
this transaction  . kindly send me your full names and home address. Let me
start working on those legal documents which will give you an opportunity
to receive the funds into your bank account without any delay.

I Wait for your quick response
Adams Osei
